evs.gui.windows
Interface GUIInterface

All Superinterfaces:
GUICommunicator
All Known Implementing Classes:
AggregationA, MoreVerificationWindowDialog, OutputA, VerificationA, VerificationB
public interface GUIInterface
extends GUICommunicator

A root interface containing methods for saving data permanently to an analysis unit and for storing and displaying temporary data that has not yet been saved. Local data should always be displayed in preference to saved data, because saved data should be used to update the store of local data once available. By implication, local data should always be updated after loading saved data.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Method Detail

saveLocalData

void saveLocalData()
Saves local data in the active input fields to a temporary store for the active analysis unit.

saveData

boolean saveData()
Saves data in the local store to an analysis unit.

Returns:
true if the data were saved.

showLocalData

void showLocalData()
Displays the local data previously saved to a temporary store. Local data should always be displayed in preference to saved data, because saved data should be used to update the store of local data once available.

updateLocalData

void updateLocalData(AnalysisUnit unit)
Updates local data with a saved AnalysisUnit.

Parameters:
unit - the unit

clearLocalData

void clearLocalData(AnalysisUnit unit)
Removes local data from the temporary store for a specified AnalysisUnit.

Parameters:
unit - the unit

clearAllLocalData

void clearAllLocalData()
Clears all local data, resetting the window to its original condition.

disposeOfChildren

void disposeOfChildren()
Disposes of any open dialogs or frames associated with the GUI window. Call this method before initiating a shutdown.
